issue.title: [Java] Add forward compatibility checks for unrecognized future MetadataVersion
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9545](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9545). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should have no need of these checks in theory, but they present a safeguard should some years in the future it became necessary to increment the MetadataVersion.
